previewText: Beneath the heights of the North Wall mountain range stretches windswept scrubland that marches to the Shining Sea. Home to tribes of intolerant wild elves and aggressive herds of centaur raiders, Elfharrow is as unwelcoming as it is mysterious.
benefit: You add Athletics and Nature to your class skill list, and you gain a +1 bonus to Athletics checks and Nature checks.
flavor: The Elfharrow badlands, known in prior days as the Bandit Wastes, extend as far north as the Dead Vale, as far west as the shores of the Shining Sea, and south and east to the North Wall.
name: Elfharrow
